modName: New Follower - Argortha - The Daedric Princess
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds a new follower to the game – Argortha – The Daedric Princess.
She uses one-handed weapons, bows, spells and shouts.
You can find her in Whiterun, in Jorrvaskr (If you download Dremora Race version, she is located in The Drunken Huntsman)
She levels with you, even if you don’t take her with you.

INSTALLATION:
1. Download the archive
2. Unrar the archive in your Skyrim/Data Directory
3. That’s it..

If you find any bugs, issues or anything else... Post a comment.

RELEASE HISTORY

V1.0 – default release
V1.01-added optional dremora race (with screenshots)



MY OTHER MODS:
Make anyone your follower: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=15805
Merhart - Werewolf Follower http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=15890


Today is the first day I've ever worked on a mod, the first day in which i even opened the CK. I've never done anything like that before, so... Tell me what  you think.
author: leothebest15
